channel.title: shell-shock on Tanishq Chaudhary

item.title: TryHackMe: 0day Writeup
item.description: A pretty easy THM room. You just need to know what to do, and the rest is a cake-walk. Play 1. Enumeration and Scanning 1.1. Web Exploration We find the /secret/ directory in the enumeration. We find a id_rsa key, in /backup/ 1.2. Web Enumeration: Nikto ┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~] └─$ nikto -h 10.10.157.88 - Nikto v2.1.6 --------------------------------------------------------------------------- + Target IP: 10.10.157.88 + Target Hostname: 10.10.157.88 + Target Port: 80 + Start Time: 2021-05-28 04:11:18 (GMT-4) --------------------------------------------------------------------------- + Server: Apache/2.
